ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph

Interface IEditGraphObservable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<IVertex,IEdge>, edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Hypergraph<IVertex,IEdge>, IGravisGraph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditGraphDecorator

    public interface IEditGraphObservable
extends IGravisGraph
    This interface provides support for adding IEditGraphEventListener listeners to an instance of IGravisGraph.
    An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.EDITED is fired if the call of method IGravisGraph.setEdgeType(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.util.EdgeType) changes the existing edge type.
    An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.VISUAL_EDITED is fired if the call of method IGravisGraph.setName(String) or IGravisGraph.setDescription(String) changes the existing value.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
